name: In Search of Atlantis
description:
In Search of Atlantis is a 2D game in which you control a submarine looking for Atlantis. Through decision-making skills and some luck, one's journey may or may not be fruitful. Who knows what awaits us in the depths?

Controls

(Mouse/Touch only)

Credits

Programming & Graphic Design: SuperSjoerdie
Music, Sound & Promo content: validbit

Font Compass Pro by somepx https://somepx.itch.io/

Ambience was created and mixed from samples generously provided by following people (due to inability to recreate it in the current env.) under following licenses:
scratchikken, wjoojoo, Kinoton
CC-BY-3.0, CC0, CC0
